creator: nospamforstokes@whisperwire.com
text:
When a <sound> tag is given a directory, it randomly picks from anything in 
that directory.

Sniffing the binaries might be overkill -- checking extensions might be 
acceptible -- but at the very least it could ignore subdirectories.

I put some default sounds in my CVS-controlled build, but the sound task often 
errors trying to play the CVS/ subdirectory.
